Articles.Content:
I thought it was about time to introduce myself so Hi!

My name is Atryaz, I am from the United Kingdom and I have been playing KSP for some time now (Since 0.20). Although I haven't quite grasped the art of rendezvous or interplanetary transfers, I still enjoy messing around and coming up with fun missions in sandbox mode.

See you around! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Welcome aboard. Do not worry about your lack of interplanetary experience - I have played since 2012 and haven't ventured out of Kerbin SOI ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Hi there fellow UK pilot! While I have been to other world's I still like sandbox best ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
